value.name: Four years after Megxit, the Sussexes say everything is rosy across the pond - but as figures show their Archewell Foundation is low on donations, critics beg to differ
value.description: Judging by the slick, minute-long video released this month by the Duke and Duchess of Sussex 's Archewell Foundation, the past year has been nothing short of a triumph.

value.name: Prince Harry will soon be a member of my bald, ginger club says Scots comic
value.description: COMIC Ray Bradshaw may be signing  ginger footie idols John Hartson and Liam Boyce as  lookalikes ahead of his new  shows – but he has his eyes set firmly on Prince Harry. The

value.name: Prince Harry urged to apologise to 'hurt' King Charles ahead of Christmas
value.description: Prince Harry is being criticized for keeping his children from King Charles. He’s being advised to apologize by royal reporter Michael Cole.

value.name: Prince and Princess of Wales to make first official Italy trip but unlikely to meet the Pope
value.description: It will be the first time they have been hosted there as senior royals and their first joint official visit since Elizabeth II died

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Jet to Tropical Holiday Vacation with Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet
value.description: Meghan, 42, and Harry, 39, have squeezed in a few private vacations this year. In September, the couple reportedly stopped in Portugal (where Harry’s cousin Princess Eugenie and her family live part-time) after the 2023 Invictus Games in Germany and quietly visited the Caribbean in October after marking World Mental Health Day in New York City.

value.name: 32 interesting facts about Prince Harry
value.description: Prince Harry may no longer be an official member of the royal family, but there's still lots to know about the fifth-in-line to the throne... For decades, Prince Harry – formerly the Duke of Sussex – was one of the most popular members of the British royal family.

value.name: Take the literary quiz of 2023 — from Prince Harry to Zadie Smith
value.description: Oh yes, it’s that time of year. Trivia! And what better way to prove your book learning than by answering questions about, err, books. It’s been an interesting year in Literatshire … we’ve had mega-selling cosy crime, one record-busting royal ...

value.name: Diana ‘left out in the cold’ after buying expensive Xmas gifts for Royals when Charles didn’t tell her about tradition
value.description: PRINCESS Diana was “left out in the cold” when Charles didn’t tell her about one major Christmas royal present tradition.  Typically, the royals exchange “gag gifts” on Christmas Eve –

value.name: Who will attend the royal Christmas Day church service at Sandringham this year?
value.description: The King and Queen will attend the Christmas Day morning service at Sandringham Church, Buckingham Palace said this week. The pair will on Monday (December 25) march together with other royal family members.

value.name: Meghan Markle 'deliberately distancing' from Prince Harry may bring 'big change'
value.description: A royal expert has weighed in on the Duchess of Sussex supposed strategy for her 'own brand'. An expert has weighed in on Meghan Markle's apparent ploy to distance herself from husband Harry - and it may be about to pay off.

value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have been torn apart in a recent US editorial as their successes - or lack of - are ridiculed.

value.description: They were spotted with Lili and Archie in Zapotal, Nandayure, and Guanacaste.

value.description: Prince Harry recalled how he 'roared' at Meghan Markle's unique royal-inspired Christmas present back in 2020, which is when they spent the holidays in California

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle set for a ‘year of redemption’ as they consider relocating
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are reportedly hoping 2024 will be their “year of redemption”, as they’re considering a big move to Los Angeles.

value.name: Royals in chic skiwear: Princess Diana, Princess Kate, Princess Eugenie & more
value.description: If there's anyone that truly gets the meaning of 'alpine chic', it's the royals. Every year, the world's most famous families pack their finest salopettes and head to the likes of Klosters, Lech, and Verbier to hit the slopes in style on their skiing holidays.

value.description: This past week, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle enjoyed some time vacationing in Costa Rica with their children, Archie and Lilibet. The family stopped by Zapotal, Nandayure, and Guanacaste, CRHoy.com reports, staying from December 14 to December 20.

value.name: King Charles gives 'bizarre' Christmas gift to staff which he slips into their lockers
value.description: According to one of King Charles III's former employees, the monarch likes to give his staff quirky presents during the festive season. Grant Harrold, who worked as a butler at Highgrove for seven years, told The Mirror about the interesting gifts he had received from the King.

value.name: King Charles' thoughts on not spending 'hectic' Christmas with grandchildren Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet
value.description: During a chat with HELLO!, Ingrid Seward, royal author and editor-in-chief of Majesty Magazine, confessed that the King may be "relieved" not to spend Christmas with Prince Harry and his family as the day tends to be pretty "hectic" and he won't be able to give his full attention to them.

video.name: King Charles' thoughts on not spending 'hectic' Christmas with grandchildren Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet

value.name: Logan Paul has very extra response to South Park’s savage Prime spoof
value.description: Logan Paul has tried to get his own back on South Park after the show utterly destroyed him with their Prime energy drink spoof. In the latest episode of the long running show, the controversial YouTuber and current WWE United States Champion became their latest target in an absolutely savage parody.

value.name: Mike Tindall Reveals His Cheeky Nickname For Prince William
value.description: Mike Tindall shares a close bond with his cousin-in-law Prince William, so much so that he is not afraid to call him with a rather cheeky nickname and reveal it to the public.

value.name: King Charles jokes about 'sausage fingers' with Prince William in Coronation film
value.description: King Charles III joked about having "sausage fingers" with his son Prince William during rehearsals for the Coronation, a behind-the-scenes BBC documentary has captured. The affectionate television portrait of the King reveals a playful and warm relationship with his son.

value.name: PA photographers choose their top pictures of 2023
value.description: A new King was crowned in a year of huge events captured by photographers at the PA news agency. Here they choose their favourite images of 2023 and the stories behind them: Victoria Jones captured the moment King Charles was crowned by the Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby in Westminster Abbey. The images were shared around the world.

value.name: What traditions does the royal family have for Christmas?
value.description: The traditions begin the week before Christmas, when the family holds an annual luncheon. The affair is for extended members of the family and it’s held at Buckingham Palace. The same luncheon was held last year by Charles and Camilla, only it was at Windsor Castle.
